overview: Daruma Mifune, a former leader of the Kurosawa clan, finally completes his 15-year sentence and returns to the streets. But the clan is now led by Maiko Kyo, the wife of his late predecessor. In that context, the clan gives Daruma a new and unexplored territory, Kyo Maiko, a video production studio. There Daruma begins his new Vtuber life, but not all accounts from her past are settled.
title: Daruma The Yakuza VTuber
